name: Zurg Serverless
description: A serverless Real Debrid WebDAV server with HTML file browser and .STRM file-based streaming, running as a Cloudflare Worker, using Cloudflare D1.

USERNAME.description: Basic authentication username (optional, leave empty to disable auth)

PASSWORD.description: Basic authentication password (optional, leave empty to disable auth)

STRM_TOKEN.description: Optional token for STRM file protection

BASE_URL.description: Override base URL (leave empty for auto-detection)

HIDE_BROKEN_TORRENTS.description: Hide broken torrents in listings (default: true)
